verses.verse: {A Song of Ascents {120:T Or Degrees; and so through Psalm 134}} {A Prayer for Deliverance} d I cried to the Lord in my distress, and he responded to me.
"Lord , deliver me {Lit. my soul} from lips that lie and tongues that deceive."
What will be given to you, and what will be done to you, you treacherous tongue?
Like a {The Heb. lacks Like a} sharp arrow from a warrior, along with fiery coals from juniper trees!
How terrible for me, that I am an alien in Meshech, that I reside among the tents of Kedar!
I have resided too long with those who hate peace.
I am in favor of peace; but when I speak, they are in favor of war.
